thread.title: Arctic Blast Inbound. First Alert for Late Weekend Winter Storm into Monday
thread.title_full: Arctic Blast Inbound. First Alert for Late Weekend Winter Storm into Monday

author: Eric Pritchett
title: Arctic Blast Inbound. First Alert for Late Weekend Winter Storm into Monday
text:
By Eric Pritchett ,
3 hours ago CHARLOTTESVILLE, Va. (WVIR) - An Arctic Blast inbound later Friday and will make for a sharply colder weekend. In addition, a soon to develop Winter Storm to impact the Mid-Atlantic region late Sunday into Monday. First, the Arctic front will cross the region Friday afternoon and likely touch off some scattered rain and or snow showers. Brisk winds and sharply colder to follow Friday night and the first weekend of 2025. Daytime highs in the 30s and overnight lows in the 10s and 20s. Read full article
Read in NewsBreak 1
